website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Note 4 is a 2014 phone that's past its prime. Opt for the Note 5 or Galaxy S7 instead.
pros: The 5.7-inch Samsung Galaxy Note 4 has a brilliant high-resolution screen and takes excellent outdoor shots on its 16-megapixel camera with optical image stabilization
Using the stylus is more convenient, and the battery charges very quickly
cons: Low light and indoor shots aren't as good as they should be

customer_reviews.title: I really like the phone but now I see I'm going to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone on October 4, 2017. Now it is November 8, 2017 and yesterday, out of the blue the phone just shut off. I changed the battery to a new one and it is still having the same problem. I really like the phone but now I see I'm going to have to but another I phone. I should have kept the $319 hat I paid for this phone and brought the iPhone.. I don't recommend anyone to but older phones anymore, because of all the updates and software changes. I really love this phone...
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and works just like it should. Nice phone for the price. Only downfall was the battery that came with it wouldn't last half a day with normal Web browsing and Facebook usage. Upgraded battery and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: Received this on time. Says it is like new. It appears to be new. Works great. Instructions to activate were easy from Purple Cobra. Straight talk had me up and going within 20 minutes. I will definately buy from Purple Cobra again.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Though phone it's self is nice, I have changed the battery twice and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Though phone it's self is nice, I have changed the battery twice and it still got way way to hot. Had to buy another type phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Samsung, instead of a blu, which gave me the blues.
customer_reviews.text: Love it works to perfection on, yup Verizon, via straight talk. Thanx.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Magee

customer_reviews.title: The battery life sucks however. Will be buying another battery
customer_reviews.text: I give 5 stars for overall performance of the phone. The battery life sucks however. Will be buying another battery. Would definitely buy this phone again though!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Excellent service on the part of suppliers
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Excellent service on the part of suppliers. Had to put a new battery in it.
customer_reviews.author: reddragondw@gmail.com

customer_reviews.title: The phone sucks, it shuts off all the time
customer_reviews.text: The phone sucks, it shuts off all the time, battery drains super fast, the charging port is messed up, it will not charge half the time. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone was great and amazing the first time I got it
customer_reviews.text: Phone was great and amazing the first time I got it, no scratches or anything but for only having it for about a week the battery life drops really quickly even though I'm not using my phone and then it randomly shuts off at times. Might have to get a new battery for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Stewart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a new phone and I am very pleased with ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is just what I wanted. It looks like a new phone and I am very pleased with it. I don't think I have even begun to learn all the tricks and know all the bells and whistles. I would buy from this seller again. Very quick delivery, packaged well and everything was included. I just had to to to Straight talk online and transfer my number.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt even give it a star but you have to inorder to submit
customer_reviews.text: Says flawless, this phone has scratches and gouges in it, with a peace of wood stuck in the head phones holes, and did not come in original box, cam wrapped in boule wrap. Highly disapoint ed in this item......
customer_reviews.author: joshua gallup

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Note 4 and it came on time. It is working great, no problems. I am still getting use to it. I ordered one for my husband as well. Will write a review of his Note 4 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Never ending boot loop
customer_reviews.text: Shut down and now stuck in a never-ending boot loop days after my return window closed!! Tried new battery, clear the system catch, and did a factory reboot. Still nothing
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: The first phone we got kept cutting off, once I requested a refund I was contacted almost immediately and the problem was corrected. Great customer service, will update on how the 2nd phone turns out but overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dejah

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! I purchased this phone used and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I purchased this phone used and it came brand new with no flaws. It was a GREAT buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessie bryant
